metadata.name: Utopian Plains - Special Edition 0001
metadata.description:
Utopian Plains expands on the Utopias of the Damned series. This new series aims to explore the role of the individual, as an influential force on social structures, and in turn how this moulds the individual.
__

Artwork specifications: 4000 x 2828px | MP4 | 30 second loop
Edition: 1/1
Generative | Abstraction | Creative coding | Motion | Graphic design
Created using JavaScript.
Artist: Andrew Strauss
www.studiostrauss.com.au
